meanings: 국방 및 군사·무기 및 병기공학 Merkava Mk1/Mk2

-Pronounced "Mark two" not "emkay two" Volkswagen's second generation of the mark chassis. Production started in 1985 and ended in 1992 for Golf/GTIs, Jettas and Sciroccos and in 1995 for Canadian Corrados. The mk2 Jetta is still in production in China (hence the chinese door handle conversion). ...
